localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Finally, a flashcard app that just works—for iOS and macOS. Thoughtfully designed, Fresh Cards is a joy to use. Using a swipe interface, card review is quick and best of all, cards are auto-scheduled for review again based on how well you did.
blogPost.body: Finally, a flashcard app that just works—for iOS and macOS. Thoughtfully designed, Fresh Cards is a joy to use. Using a swipe interface, card review is quick and best of all, cards are auto-scheduled for review again based on how well you did.
blogPost.title: Fresh Cards - Flashcards that just work
blogPost.author: Allen Ussher

localize.description: 最后，一款适用于iOS和MacOS的闪存卡应用程序。设计周到的新卡使用起来是一件令人愉悦的事情。使用刷卡界面，卡片审查速度很快，最棒的是，卡片会根据您的表现自动安排再次审查。
最後，一款適用於iOS和MacOS的閃存卡應用程序。設計周到的新卡使用起來是一件令人愉悅的事情。使用刷卡界面，卡片審查速度很快，最棒的是，卡片會根據您的表現自動安排再次審查。

previous.excerpt: final makes it easy to give & receive feedback on your video & audio files. It marks all comments with a timestamp, so you know exactly where to make changes. Your project feedback gets stored in one place & you never have to skim through lots of emails again.
previous.title: final - Real time feedback for your video and audio files.

localize.description: final 让您可以轻松地对您的视频和音频文件进行反馈和接收。它用时间戳标记所有的评论，这样你就可以准确地知道在哪里进行修改。你的项目反馈会被存储在一个地方，你再也不用浏览大量的电子邮件了。
localize.tagline: 对您的视频和音频文件进行实时反馈。

localize.description: final 讓您可以輕鬆地對您的視頻和音頻文件進行反饋和接收。它用時間戳標記所有的評論，這樣你就可以準確地知道在哪裏進行修改。你的項目反饋會被存儲在一個地方，你再也不用瀏覽大量的電子郵件了。
localize.tagline: 對您的視頻和音頻文件進行實時反饋。
